sections.title: Exalted (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Exalted class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Exalted)
sections.description: Grants weapon proficiency with the exalted's chosen deity's favored weapon.

sections.title: Spells per Day/Spells Known (Exalted)
sections.description: Advances spellcasting in a previous divine spellcasting class, gaining spells per day, spells known, and increased caster level without other class benefits.

sections.title: Divine Brand (Su) (Exalted)
sections.description: A permanent mark representing the deity appears on the exalted's body and functions as a silver holy or unholy symbol when uncovered.

sections.title: Obedience (Ex) (Exalted)
sections.description: The exalted must perform daily obedience to her deity to maintain all abilities granted by the prestige class.

sections.title: Scholar (Ex) (Exalted)
sections.description: Allows the exalted to add one Knowledge skill of her choice to her list of class skills.

sections.title: Vitality (Su) (Exalted)
sections.description: Provides a +2 sacred or profane bonus on Fortitude saves and Constitution checks to stabilize due to divine energy infusion.

sections.title: Divine Boon (Exalted)
sections.description: Grants access to three progressive divine boons from the chosen deity at 3rd, 6th, and 9th levels, using character level as caster level for spell-like abilities.

sections.title: Religious Speaker (Ex) (Exalted)
sections.description: Grants a +2 competence bonus on Bluff, Diplomacy, and Perform (oratory) checks while the divine brand is visible.

sections.title: Expanded Portfolio (Su) (Exalted)
sections.description: Grants access to one domain of the chosen deity and allows daily use of domain spells as spell-like abilities with exalted level as caster level.

sections.title: Aspect of Divinity (Su) (Exalted)
sections.description: Grants physical divine traits and permanent protection from an opposed alignment with -4 penalty to Disguise checks.

sections.title: Ardent Vision (Sp) (Exalted)
sections.description: Allows at-will casting of detect alignment spells against one chosen opposed alignment with character level as caster level.

sections.title: Perform Miracle (Su) (Exalted)
sections.description: Once per day, duplicates cleric spells up to 6th level, other spells up to 5th level, undoes harmful effects, or makes deity requests with material costs.
